And here it is, waiting for your timely arrival, miss.
I see... Wait, is this it?
It was just one old case, neither small nor big. I couldn't help
Well, no, but... what's this box anyway?
No idea. It's sealed pretty tightly, and there isn't a keyhole
(True, it feels durable from what I can tell, and there aren't
any spaces to pry it open.)
This area was supposedly a workshop of the sorts a long time
ago, so maybe it was used for something back then.
Someone from the Miners Guild is here to pick up the garbage.
Hoh... To think that den of filth could dispatch such a beauty.
The man sized me up with a dirty look. I returned his gaze with
Should you ever find yourself "sick" of picking up rocks, come
here. I'll treat you with much love, wahaha!
Wh-Who the heck was that rude guy?
He's the conductor in charge of this area as you can see...
If possible, I hope you can avoid rocking the boat too much.
(Jeez! I had both my chest and butt groped today. What an awful
Anyway, it's about time I return to my post—
Miss, it's dangerous here, so head on home. It's not that rare
for them to show up, but—
I think not! If anything, this is perfect timing! I need to do
something about my pent-up stress today!
Let's assist the person from earlier.
Today, we get rid of them
We're fine here, go help the
Looks like we'll be able to clean up the others at this rate.
Erina-san, thank you for your cooperation.
Not bad for a little girl. I like you even more now.
Nevertheless, those Sheilans need to give it a rest already. All
they're doing is giving us more unnecessary work.
Those monsters were never around a while ago, but in the past
six months, they suddenly started appearing in the area.
It's why we think those guys may have done something. There's
unnerving stories about their involvement in sorcery and rituals,
too... All rumors at the end of the day, though.
Nonsense! They are undoubtedly the masterminds! No doubt
they're trying to take over Daemon Machina City!
I think you're just a tad bit overreacting—
And now they're colluding with those Merchant Guild fools?!
I will not acknowledge the rebooting of the Old Line! In the
And so, the conductor rambled on and on with the intensity of
呼び出し[おしゃべりポップアップ]
